name: Mini Dungeon (John Crc)
description:
//WORK IN PROGRESS

lastest update : v0.0.0.6

It's my first game, so, please by gentle :)
  • Arrow keys to move
  • Space Bar to Slash
  • Enter to reset level

Find the Emerald then the Key to unlock the exit door...
